name: Minesweeper·
description:
The Best Classic Minesweeper (Mines) with high quality graphic and animation for iOS!

Minesweeper is one of the most popular games on PC and now on iOS. To create a better and more interesting experience, game was designed with flat style and using stunning animation effects.

Main Features of Minesweeper:

Modern menu and game interface
Zoom the board easily, with movable flag button
Long Tap to create flag faster
Gameplay is the same as the classic one and so easy to play
4 difficulties from easy to hard, and a custom mode with incredible 450 mines
All screen types are supported.
More difficult, more challenged but more great feelings when you win it.

Let’s play and show off your high score with friends!
publishers: CAT VIET SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT & MEDIA JSC
